org.apache.shardingsphere.shardingjdbc.jdbc.adapter

类 AbstractStatementAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.shardingsphere.shardingjdbc.jdbc.adapter.WrapperAdapter
      • org.apache.shardingsphere.shardingjdbc.jdbc.unsupported.AbstractUnsupportedOperationStatement
        • org.apache.shardingsphere.shardingjdbc.jdbc.adapter.AbstractStatementAdapter
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    AutoCloseable, Statement, Wrapper
    直接已知子类:
    AbstractUnsupportedOperationPreparedStatement, MasterSlaveStatement, ShardingStatement

    public abstract class AbstractStatementAdapter
extends AbstractUnsupportedOperationStatement
    Adapter for Statement.
    作者:
    zhangliang, gaohongtao, yangyi

      • 从接口继承的字段 java.sql.Statement

        CLOSE_ALL_RESULTS, CLOSE_CURRENT_RESULT, EXECUTE_FAILED, KEEP_CURRENT_RESULT, NO_GENERATED_KEYS, RETURN_GENERATED_KEYS, SUCCESS_NO_INFO
